summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2013/03/07
Average Rating: 4.9
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['David Paymer', 'Tim Matheson', 'James Hayman', 'Joe Lazarov', 'Janice Cooke', 'Patrick R. Norris', 'Bethany Rooney', 'Jeremiah S. Chechik', 'Ron Lagomarsino', 'Michael Schultz'], 'Producers': ['Not Specified'], 'Starring': ['Rachel Bilson', 'Jaime King', 'Wilson Bethel']}
Review Text: I'm a guy and as such, have never been one to "waste my time on the soaps," however I made the mistake of watching the first couple of Hart of Dixie, season 1 episodes, as freebies, and I guess I got hooked. Now, I'm paying for season two and have found that like someone else once noted, Zoe has become less likeable while Lemon has become much more likeable (whoulda thunket?). I will continue to watch Hart and follow the (great) cast through their trials and tribulations and enjoy every minute of it. I guess you could say "I'm hooked."
Review Title: It's the only "soap" I've ever watched
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2013/03/07
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Sheree Folkson'], 'Producers': ['Robert Bernstein', 'Douglas Rae', 'Paul Ritchie'], 'Starring': ['Alice Eve', 'Kelly Macdonald', 'David Tennant']}
Review Text: I really didn't expect much from this little bit of "fluff," just thought I'd watch it while I ate. But, surprisingly, it had a few little twists and turns that made it unusual and kinda "sweet." All in all, though off the beaten track, it turned out to be enjoyable.
Review Title: Pretty good
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2013/06/07
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['J. Rupert Thompson'], 'Producers': ['Matt Kunitz', 'Trice Barto', 'Ian Busch', 'Cece Pleasants', 'Scott Larsen', 'Matt Kaye', 'Hilary Liberman Shields', 'Matthew Muchka', 'Keith Geller'], 'Studio': ['ABC']}
Review Text: If you don't laugh at people's physical misfortunes, you won't like this show. If you do like the Three Stooges, you'll love this show. It is the same old slip on a banana peel, pie in the face, and fall flat on your butt stuff, but it is hard not to laugh - it is genuinely funny.
Review Title: Goofy slapstick, but funny!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2013/08/27
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Antoine Fuqua'], 'Producers': ['Gerard Butler'], 'Starring': ['Gerard Butler', 'Morgan Freeman', 'Dylan McDermott'], 'Studio': ['FilmDistrict Distribution', 'LLC']}
Review Text: I liked it. You do have to take it with a pinch of salt, but as long as you don't take it TOO seriously, you can appreciate it for what it is: an entertaining action movie with a somewhat plausible plot and respectable acting. I've liked Gerard Butler ever since "Law Abiding Citizen" and I thought that he did a good job in his hero-save-the-day role. The best two compliments I could give this movie is that it was worth the $5.00 I paid to watch it, and I'll watch it again when it's on my subscription TV..
Review Title: Good movie - action filled and enjoyable for me
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

Average Rating: 4.7

Review Text: I really liked this movie, liked all of the actors - casting was spot on. It's a little bit romantic comedy, a little bit action/adventure, and a little bit conspiracy spy thriller - a little something for everybody. Don't take it too seriously and you'll enjoy it. Be aware that there's lots of violence, but it's light-hearted violence, no blood and guts. It's worth watching!
Review Title: A light-hearted CIA spy thriller
Rating: 4.0

Review Text: I like Jason Statham, primarily because I enjoy seeing the bad guys getting their butts kicked - and he does it well. This movie isn't perfection, but if you like Statham movies, it's worth the time. Acting is pretty good, his daughter's part was well played and the story line was pretty good too. All in all, if you like action movies, you'll like Homefront.
Review Title: Worth a watch
Rating: 4.0

raw_response:
**Shopping Preferences and Trends Summary:**

- **Genre Preferences:** Strong affinity for action, comedy, romance, and light-hearted thrillers. Shows appreciation for humorous, slapstick content and character-driven narratives.
- **Rating Consistency:** Generally high ratings (around 4.0-4.8), suggesting a preference for quality entertainment. However, occasional lower ratings highlight dissatisfaction with specific titles.
- **Cast Influences:** Notable appreciation for actors like Jason Statham, Gerard Butler, Bruce Willis, and unique performers like Danny Trejo—even when films may fall short.
- **Content Advisory Awareness:** Frequent selection of titles with violence, alcohol use, and adult themes, indicating comfort with mature content while maintaining a light-hearted view.
- **Viewing Context:** Enjoyment of viewing experiences during mundane tasks (eating), suggesting a possible inclination towards lighter fare for casual viewing.
- **Series Engagement:** Expressed disappointment with series endings, indicating investment in episodic storytelling, alongside a “watch it again” mentality for enjoyable content.
- **Mixed Experiences:** Occasionally encounters underwhelming films despite expectations (e.g., heavy graphics but weak storylines), underscoring a critical approach to content consumption.

Overall, this individual enjoys engaging, action-packed narratives with humor, a mix of genres, and is influenced by familiar actors, while balancing entertainment quality with expectations.

target_interaction.title: Three Stars
target_interaction.text: It was OK, just OK. Moderately entertaining, but nothing to write home about.
